synopsis.text:
Year UC 0079 witnesses the final stages of the One Year War, a brutal conflict between the Earth Federation and Zeon forces. As the Federation advances towards A Baoa Qu, the battleground shifts into the vast expanse of space. Desperate to bolster their defenses, the Zeon army relies heavily on the 603rd Technical Development Team aboard the Jotunheim.

Led by Lieutenant Oliver May, the team works tirelessly to evaluate and test experimental weapons and cutting-edge mobile suit designs. Each trial brings forth a unique set of challenges and triumphs, contributing a significant chapter to the annals of the One Year War. As the war hurtles towards its climax, the fate of humanity hangs in the balance, hinging on the success of these experimental weapons and the courage of their test pilots.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
